oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sequoyah portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sequoyah, or George Guess (1770?-1843). Color portrait from waist up. He wears a blue coat and vest with white collar and red necktie, as well as a red and white decorated head piece, and a medallion hanging from his neck. He holds a paper and pipe. "Se-Quo-Yah, or George Guess: Inventor of the Cherokee Alphabet"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sequoyah, 1770?-1843
Sequoyah, 1770?-1843;Cherokee;Cherokee language
Indians of North America;Scholars
